title: Michael B. Jordan debuts unisex capsule collection with Coach
text:
Actor Michael B. Jordan has joined forces with Coach to launch a fashion collection.

On Monday, the "Black Panther" star teased out the new collaboration with a fun boomerang-style video on Instagram.

"Signature Rasengan was a must for my #CoachxMBJ denim jacket," he wrote in a caption. "A preview of my collection. Have a surprise for you guys tomorrow."

The new Coach x Michael B. Jordan drop is a limited-edition collection inspired by the animated Japanese manga series "Naruto."

Available on the brand's website starting Tuesday, the line includes 22 products that include clothing, footwear, bags, jackets and more.

The collection includes a mix of denim, leather and other materials retailing from $95 -$2500.

"It was important to design pieces that represent my cultural influences and my community, pieces that I could see my friends, family and fans wearing with pride," Jordan said in a statement on Coach's website.

Getty Images

The news of Jordan's unisex line comes not too long after twinning with actress Zendaya in a gray Berluti suit at the 2019 Harper's Bazaar ICONS party.

As one of the first global faces of Coach Menswear, it's not surprising Coach tapped Jordan for this capsule collection.
description: Michael B. Jordan collaborates with Coach to release unisex fashion capsule collection.
